import React, { Component } from "react" import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import { DataContext } from "../Context" import "./ProductCards.css" import addCart from ".../addCart.png" class ProductCard extends Component { static contextType = DataContext render() { const { currentCurrency } = this.context const { products } = this.props return (
{products.map(({ id, name, gallery, prices }) => (
{name}
{prices[currentCurrency].currency.symbol}{prices[currentCurrency].amount}
))}
) } } export default ProductCard
